page.title: 19Dundrennan School Playground
page.content: At playtime the boys mostly play football and a few girls join in too. We play the length of the playground. Sometimes we play football rounders, this is a game where instead of using a rounders bat you just kick the football as far as you can. Occasionlly when we haven't got a football we play hide and seek or British Bulldogs, this is where we run from a wall to a sundial without being caught which is approximately twenty metres. If we are fed up we play a Wallie Tournament, all we have to do here is kick the ball against the wall and the first one to miss is out. We play games like Three and In, here the first person to score three goals goes in goals. The smaller children play schools here they inpersonate the teachers and act the part of naughty children.
